body: Are you allowed to label you maps with [ACCEPTED] etc. I did it earlier on and it kept getting editted by IvyCode? I have noticed that lots of other people have started to do it now aswell.
body_tagged: Are you allowed to label you maps with [ACCEPTED] etc. I did it earlier on and it kept getting editted by IvyCode? I have noticed that lots of other people have started to do it now aswell.
title: Map Releases Tags

replies.body: You should not add tags such as [ACCEPTED]. No tags are actually necessary, unless you are specifying a gamemode.
replies.body_tagged: You should not add tags such as [ACCEPTED]. No tags are actually necessary, unless you are specifying a gamemode.

replies.body: Ok thanks I think you should probably put it in here http://avicus.net/forums/2360ee224 so it is clear to everyone on the rule change from the old forums
replies.body_tagged: Ok thanks I think you should probably put it in here http://avicus.net/forums/2360ee224 so it is clear to everyone on the rule change from the old forums

replies.body: Users were never supposed to tag their own posts. Back on the old forums map committee members did so.
replies.body_tagged: Users were never supposed to tag their own posts. Back on the old forums map committee members did so.

replies.body: OK never knew that thanks anyway
